LightningComponentBundle.description: Set record detail section specific to an application

property.name: configName
property.label: Metadata Developer Name
property.description: Metadata record name to drive the detail section (A new record will be created with the given name if existing name is not found, API Name can only contain underscores and alphanumeric characters without spaces)

property.name: profileNames
property.label: Profile Names
property.description: Comma separated profile names to get configuration access of detail page
